snippet: A hearing last week into the 2006 death of Alexander V. Litvinenko, a former K.G.B. officer, only added to speculation about why he was poisoned in a London bar.
abstract: Hearing into 2006 death of former KGB officer Alexander V Litvinenko only adds to speculation about why he was poisoned in London bar, leaving many wondering whether mysteries of his murder will ever be solved.
lead_paragraph: A hearing last week into the 2006 death of Alexander V. Litvinenko, a former K.G.B. officer, only added to speculation about why he was poisoned in a London bar.

headline.seo: Hearing Into Litvinenko’s Death Still Leaves Motive a Mystery
headline.main: Hearing Reveals Details of Spy’s Life, but Motive for Death Is Still a Mystery
headline.print_headline: Hearing Reveals Details of Spy’s Life, But Motive for Death Is Still a Mystery
